All Classes

Class
Description
Administrator
This class basically defines the administrators of the Hospital which are the PhysicianAdministrators and the Director.
Director
This class defines the Director of the Hospital who manages the PhysicianAdministrators.there is a unique Director of each Hospital.
Employee
This class basically defines the employee working at the Hospital.This class is abstract.
Hospital
This class basically defines a hospital composed of a team of Physicians,Administrators and Volunteer workers, which admits and treats patients on a first-come-first-come basis.
NoSpaceException
This class throws exceptions if the number of admitted patients in the hospital is equal to 500.
NoSpecialtyException
This class throws an exception when a physician resigns from the hospital and no other physician is avaialble with the same specialty as that of the resigning physician.
NoVolunteersException
This class throws exceptions when there is only one remaining volunteer who resigns from the hospital
Patient
This class basically defines the patients which are to be admitted in the Hospital.
Person
This class basically defines the entities of a person in the physical world.
Physician
This class basically defines the physician working at the Hospital,to apply treatment to patients.
PhysicianAdministrator
This class principally defines PhysicianAdminsitrators who manages the physicians of the Hospital.
SalariedEmployee
This class basically defines the employees working in the Hospital,and earning a salary.This class is abstract.
Volunteer
This class basically defines the volunteers working or willing to work at the Hospital.
